metadata.title: CVE-2016-20022 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 4.8, usb_parse_endpoint indrivers/usb/core/config.c does not validate the wMaxPacketSize field of anendpoint descriptor. NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products thatare no longer supported by the supplier.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
